data.title: Rural Municipalities
data.meta_description: Browse the local rural municipalities around the Rosetown area.
data.text:
R.M. of St. Andrews No. 287

Incorporated in 1911, the R.M. of St. Andrews is home to the Towns of Rosetown and Zealandia. Not including the two towns, the R.M. of St. Andrews has a population of 522. The taxable assessment for the municipality is over $84.1 million.

The Municipality encompass over 205,000 cultivated acres of productive heavy clay soil. Because of the highly productive land the R.M. of St. Andrews is home to two grain terminals and two commercial seed cleaning plants. Many specialty crops are grown in the fields of St. Andrews including mustard, lentils, canary seed and peas.

The R.M. of St. Andrews elects a Reeve and six Councillors as the governing body for the municipality. The Council meets on the 2nd Tuesday of every month.

Contact Information

Administrator: Joan Babecy

Reeve: Geoff Legge

R.M. of Pleasant Valley No. 288

The R.M. of Pleasant Valley is located west of the Town of Rosetown. Incorporated in 1911, the R.M. of Pleasant Valley is home to the organized hamlet of Fiske and the hamlets of McGee and Anglia. There is a population of 302 in the R.M. of Pleasant Valley and a taxable assessment of over $30.9 million. The major farming industry includes cattle ranching, game farming, and production of grain and special crops.

The R.M. of Pleasant Valley elects a Reeve and six Councillors as the governing body for the municipality. The Council meets on the 2nd Thursday of every month.

Contact Information

Reeve: Blake Jeffries

R.M. of Marriott No. 317

The R.M. of Marriott is located north of the Town of Rosetown. Incorporated in 1910, the R.M. of Marriott is now home to a population of 366 and a taxable assessment of over $34.1 million. The main farming industry consists of a mixture of grain and cattle.

The R.M. of Marriott elects a Reeve and six Councillors as the governing body for the municipality. The Council meets on the 2nd Tuesday of every month.

Contact Information
